amendment.description: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part B of House Report 117-3 to provide authority for additional programs of work-based learning, strikes the establishment of the National Advisory Committee and interagency agreement, and provides additional flexibility for the state plan process.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to provide authority for additional programs of work-based learning, strike the establishment of the National Advisory Committee and interagency agreement, and provide additional flexibility for the state plan process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A006) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 175 - 245 (Roll no. 30).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A006) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A006) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 175 - 245 (Roll no. 30).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Stefanik.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Stefanik amendment (A006) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 175 - 245 (Roll no. 30).
